title: Use of out-of-state institutions
context: ยง704-417 Use of out-of-state institutions. The term &ldquo;appropriate institution&rdquo; includes any institution within or without this State to which the defendant may be eligible for admission and treatment for physical or mental disease, disorder, or defect. [L 1972, c 9, pt of ยง1] COMMENTARY ON ยง704-417 This section is intended to permit the court (acting through the director of health) or the director of health to utilize institutions outside the jurisdiction of the State.
